headline: Phillips 66 (PSX) Valuation Check After Lindsey Oil Refinery Acquisition Announcement
summary: Phillips 66 (PSX) shares are in focus after the company agreed to acquire the Lindsey Oil Refinery and related infrastructure in the UK, with plans to fold key assets into its nearby Humber facility. See our latest analysis for Phillips 66. That refinery deal lands at a time when Phillips 66’s share price has seen a 5.47% 7 day share price return and a 4.07% 90 day share price return, while its 1 year total shareholder return of 23.08% and 5 year total shareholder return of 125.29% point to...
